version_description:
* Fixed Public Playlists bug

* Fixed Restore Purchases bug

Please keep the feedback coming. Thanks for your support!

Practice Smart, Play Hard.

* Learning Paths *
- Tap the "More" tab to follow one of our accelerated study plans for beginner, intermediate, and advanced players and track your progress along the way!

* Bug Fixes & Performance Upgrades *
- We're constantly working to improve the app for our users. Please keep your feedback coming!

Practice Smart, Play Hard.

Many new features in this version! Visit the “More” tab to check out the following :
- My Musician Profile
- Educator Directory
- My Practice Journal
- Metronome
- Guitar Chords Chart
- Guitar Scales Chart
- Refer a Friend

Also new: TrueFire Hot Courses Widget! Visit the “Today” screen by swiping left from your home screen, click “Edit” at the bottom, and add the extension!

We’ve also squashed some bugs and made some performance enhancements. Please keep the feedback coming! We truly appreciate it and are working hard constantly to continue improving the app.

Practice Smart, Play Hard

Link to TrueFire’s new Private Guitar Lessons app in the more tab. Check it out to get 1-on-1 instruction with a top educator!

AirPrint now prints full screen pages

Choose your default landing screen after opening the app

Sort the order of your favorite lessons

Enhanced process of adding lessons to playlists

We’ve also squashed some bugs and made some performance enhancements. Please keep the feedback coming! We truly appreciate it and are working hard constantly to continue improving the app.

Practice Smart, Play Hard

Add educators to your favorites!

Loop jam tracks

We’ve also squashed some bugs and made some performance enhancements. Please keep the feedback coming! We truly appreciate it and are working hard constantly to continue improving the app.

Practice Smart, Play Hard

* Improved video player and full screen control

*View all courses

* Minor bug fixes and improvements
Fix for users on iOS9 experiencing a crash
Bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
Offline issues resolved
Offline issues resolved

* Upgrade to All Access! Subscribe and get unlimited streaming access to our entire course library (over 30,000 video lessons!) including tab, notation, jam tracks, and more.
* Recently Watched Tab! Quickly and easily jump back into courses or lessons you’ve recently watched.
* Easier Learning Paths Access! Hit the “map” icon on the top left of the Explore screen to quickly jump into a Learning Path to guide your self-study.
* Search Improvements! Hit the “search” icon on the top right to look for the perfect course. Search by tag, topic, or educator name.
* Improved Downloading! When you purchase a course, you can download it for offline access.
* Bug Fixes & Optimizations! We’re constantly working hard to make the app experience better for you, so please keep the feedback coming.


We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Update now to see the latest features and fixes available.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is truly appreciated.

Have a question? Visit truefire.com/help or email us at help@truefire.com!

Practice Smart, Play Hard.

* PDF bug fixes

We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Update now to see the latest features and fixes available.

* Jam track and video player fixes

* Lesson download fixes

* At TrueFire, we pride ourselves on being able to offer the best music instruction to anyone, anytime, anywhere in the world, and that includes those with disabilities or impairments. We’re proud to announce that we’ve worked hard to update to our app to make learning with TrueFire even easier for those who use the VoiceOver Accessibility feature. Ignited We Stand.

Practice Smart, Play Hard.

- Favoriting lessons fix
- Restore purchases fix
- Playlist loading and downloading fixes
- Missing charts issue resolved
- Search improvements
- Course view and interaction improvements
- Soundslice improvements
- Autoplay fixes
- Better offline experience
- Download/delete lesson improvements
- Sorting fixes
- More effective cache clearing
- Easier course experience for those using Voiceover Accessibility
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

*Updated Design*
A fresh new look for the app, with even more improvements coming soon!

*New Explore Screen*
Discover new courses and get personalized recommendations quickly & easily!

*New Search Options*
Quickly explore a category and/or search within sections of the app!

*Countless Bugs Squashed & Performance Enhancements*
We dug deep to exterminate issues and improve the app substantially!

*iPhone XS, XS Max, and XR Support*
Have one of those cool new devices? The app is now optimized for you!

We’re always working hard to improve the app for you. Please keep your feedback coming!

Practice Smart, Play Hard.
- Fixed a crash experienced by some users

* Entering foreground/background fixes
* Bluetooth connectivity fixes
* Offline usability fixes
* Restore purchases fix
* Overall speed enhancements
* Various bug/crash fixes

We're always working hard to improve the app for you. Please keep your feedback coming!

* Downloaded courses crash fix experienced by some users
* Overall performance enhancements
* Accessibility fixes

* At TrueFire, we pride ourselves on being able to offer the best music instruction to anyone, anytime, anywhere in the world, and that includes those with disabilities or impairments. We’re proud to announce that we’ve worked hard to update to our app to make learning with TrueFire even easier for those who use the VoiceOver Accessibility feature. Ignited We Stand.

Practice Smart, Play Hard.

We update the TrueFire app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Love the TrueFire app? Please rate and review! Your feedback keeps the ’Fire burning. Here are the enhancements you’ll find in this update:

- New course interfaces for watching, downloading, and progress tracking
- Bug fixes for searching, playback, playlists, and profile pictures
- Accessibility improvements for metronome, home menu, and looping
- Ability to long press on courses and lessons for more options

Have a question or need help? Visit truefire.com/help or email us at help@truefire.com. Ignited we stand.
